subject: From: Office of Debt Settlem
body:
From: Office of Debt Settlement Unit <debtsettlementunitng@gmail.com
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019  
To: 
Subject: Re:Attention: Fill the Form and Get Back.
 
Attention:
Sir,
This acknowledges the receipts of your dated email without your
information receive and wondering on your email content not happy
about the claim responds for your best interest to comply immediately.
Based on the above, you are hereby advice to fill the below
application to enable us commence with your transfer process are
below:
NAME.....................................
ADDRESS..................................
TEL.......................................
FAX........................................
OCCUPATION...............................
AGE......................................
BANK NAME................................
BANK ADDRESS.............................
BANK TEL................................
BANK FAX.................................
COUNTRY..................................
ACCOUNT NUMBER...........................
SWIFT CODE...............................
IBAN NO:.................................
ROUTING NO:..............................
ACCOUNT NAME:........................
ATTACHED YOUR ID COPY.
However, please fill the processing application above and return the
back  to commence with the transfer.
Thanks to your understanding and waiting to the info to commence forward.
Regards and sincerely wait.
Yours faithfully,
Dr. Oluyemi Dipeolu.
Coordinator, Debt Settlement Unit,
Office of the Pay-Master General of Federation.
Email:debtsettlementunitng@gmail.com

subject: Re:   From: Office of Debt Settlem
body:
Hello Dr. Oluyemi Dipeolu,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

However, I'm a bit confused about the details you're asking for. Could you please explain why these specific bank details are needed? And what is the purpose of attaching an ID copy?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Patrick
